name: dev-coach-prompts
description: Sistema de prompts estruturados para coaching de desenvolvimento usando metodologia 4W+
author: Development Coach Team

scripts.validate:json: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const files = process.argv.slice(1); files.forEach(f => { try { JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(f, 'utf8')); console.log('✅', f); } catch(e) { console.error('❌', f, e.message); process.exit(1); } })"
scripts.test: npm run validate:json && npm run format:check
